languages.text: {n}Юноша надолго умолкает, а затем отвечает вам робкой улыбкой.{/n} "Скажи мне это кто другой, я бы продолжил упорствовать... Но если вы так считаете... Проклятье, кто я такой, чтобы не верить тако{mf|му|й} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}покорител{mf|ю|ьнице} пустоты{/d}, как вы? Благодарю, Лорд-капитан, что наставили. Я не подведу".

{n}Marius is silent for a long time, then smiles timidly.{/n} "If it were someone else, I would try to insist... But if you really believe that I will... Throne, who am I to doubt the words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}conqueror of the void{/d} like you? Thank you for your guidance, Lord Captain. I will not fail you."
languages.original_text: {n}Юноша надолго умолкает, а затем отвечает вам робкой улыбкой.{/n} "Скажи мне это кто другой, я бы продолжил упорствовать... Но если вы так считаете... Проклятье, кто я такой, чтобы не верить тако{mf|му|й} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}покорител{mf|ю|ьнице} пустоты{/d}, как вы? Благодарю, Лорд-капитан, что наставили. Я не подведу".

languages.text: {n}Marius schweigt lange, ehe er ängstlich lächelt.{/n} "Bei jedem anderen hätte ich versucht, zu insistieren ... Aber wenn Ihr das wirklich denkt ... Beim Thron, wer bin ich, dass ich an den Worten eines {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Eroberers der Leere{/d} zweifle? Danke für Eure Unterweisung, Lord Captain. Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marius is silent for a long time, then smiles timidly.{/n} "If it were someone else, I would try to insist... But if you really believe that I will... Throne, who am I to doubt the words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}conqueror of the void{/d} like you? Thank you for your guidance, Lord Captain. I will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marius schweigt lange, ehe er ängstlich lächelt.{/n} "Bei jedem anderen hätte ich versucht, zu insistieren ... Aber wenn Ihr das wirklich denkt ... Beim Thron, wer bin ich, dass ich an den Worten eines {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}Eroberers der Leere{/d} zweifle? "Danke für Eure Unterweisung, Lord Captain. Ich werde Euch nicht enttäuschen."

languages.text: {n}Marius reste longtemps silencieux avant de s'autoriser un faible sourire.{/n} « Avec n'importe qui d'autre, j'essayerais d'insister... Mais si c'est vraiment ce que vous croyez... Par le Trône, qui suis-je pour remettre en question les paroles d'{mf|un|une} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}{mf|conquérant|conquérante}{/d} du vide ? Merci pour vos conseils, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne vous décevrai pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marius is silent for a long time, then smiles timidly.{/n} "If it were someone else, I would try to insist... But if you really believe that I will... Throne, who am I to doubt the words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}conqueror of the void{/d} like you? Thank you for your guidance, Lord Captain. I will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marius reste longtemps silencieux avant de s'autoriser un faible sourire.{/n} « Avec n'importe qui d'autre, j'essayerais d'insister... Mais si c'est vraiment ce que vous croyez... Par le Trône, qui suis-je pour remettre en question les paroles d'{mf|un|une} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}{mf|conquérant|conquérante}{/d} du vide ? Merci pour vos conseils, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Je ne vous décevrai pas. »

languages.text: {n}Marius guarda silencio durante un tiempo y luego sonríe tímidamente.{/n} «Si fuera cualquier otro quien me lo dijera, intentaría protestar... Pero si de verdad cree que... Por el Trono, ¿quién soy yo para dudar de las palabras de un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}conquistador{mf||a} del vacío{/d} como usted? Gracias por su consejo, Lord Capitán. No le fallaré».
languages.original_text: {n}Marius is silent for a long time, then smiles timidly.{/n} "If it were someone else, I would try to insist... But if you really believe that I will... Throne, who am I to doubt the words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}conqueror of the void{/d} like you? Thank you for your guidance, Lord Captain. I will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marius guarda silencio durante un tiempo y luego sonríe tímidamente.{/n} «Si fuera cualquier otro quien me lo dijera, intentaría protestar... Pero si de verdad cree que... Por el Trono, ¿quién soy yo para dudar de las palabras de un{mf||a} {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}conquistador{mf||a} del vacío{/d} como usted? Gracias por su consejo, Lord Capitán. No le fallaré».

languages.text: {n}マリウスは長い沈黙の後に、弱々しくほほ笑む。{/n}「もし他の人でしたら否定しようとしたでしょう。ですが、陛下が本当に私を…王座よ、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}虚空の征服者{/d}たるあなたの言葉を疑うとは、私は何様だ？ご指導に感謝いたします、ロード・キャプテン。ご期待は裏切りません」
languages.original_text: {n}Marius is silent for a long time, then smiles timidly.{/n} "If it were someone else, I would try to insist... But if you really believe that I will... Throne, who am I to doubt the words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}conqueror of the void{/d} like you? Thank you for your guidance, Lord Captain. I will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: {n}マリウスは長い沈黙の後に、弱々しくほほ笑む。{/n}「もし他の人でしたら否定しようとしたでしょう。ですが、陛下が本当に私を…王座よ、{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}虚空の征服者{/d}たるあなたの言葉を疑うとは、私は何様だ？ご指導に感謝いたします、ロード・キャプテン。ご期待は裏切りません」

languages.text: {n}马吕斯沉默许久，之后露出了羞涩的笑容。{/n}“如果是别人这么说，我可能会坚持自己的主张……但如果您真的这么认为……黄金王座在上，您可是{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}征服了虚空{/d}的伟人，我怎么能怀疑您的话呢？谢谢您的指导，舰长大人，我绝不会让您失望。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marius is silent for a long time, then smiles timidly.{/n} "If it were someone else, I would try to insist... But if you really believe that I will... Throne, who am I to doubt the words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}conqueror of the void{/d} like you? Thank you for your guidance, Lord Captain. I will not fail you."

traits.locale_text: {n}马吕斯沉默许久，之后露出了羞涩的笑容。{/n}“如果是别人这么说，我可能会坚持自己的主张……但如果您真的这么认为……黄金王座在上，您可是{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}征服了虚空{/d}的伟人，我怎么能怀疑您的话呢？谢谢您的指导，舰长大人，我绝不会让您失望。”

languages.text: {n}Marius uzunca bir süre sesiz kalıyor, ardından çekingence gülümsüyor.{/n} "Eğer başka biri olsaydı ısrar etmeye çalışırdım ama... Siz öyle olacağıma inanıyorsanız... Taht adına, sizi gibi bir {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}uçsuz fatihinin{/d} sözlerinden şüphe etmek kim, ben kim? Kılavuzluğunuz için teşekkür ederim Lord Kaptan. Yüzünüzü kara çıkarmayacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Marius is silent for a long time, then smiles timidly.{/n} "If it were someone else, I would try to insist... But if you really believe that I will... Throne, who am I to doubt the words of a {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Navy}conqueror of the void{/d} like you? Thank you for your guidance, Lord Captain. I will not fail you."
